bio:
Jinjiong Yu is currently a Postdoctoral Fellow at NYU Shanghai. He obtained his Ph.D. from National University of Singapore under the supervision of Prof. Rongfeng Sun.

Research Interests

  • Probability theory
  • Interacting particle systems
  • Statistical mechanical models

Education

  •  PhD, Mathematics, National University of Singapore, 2017
  • BS, Mathematics, Peking University, 2011

Languages

  • Chinese and English.
